interface.name: org.allseen.LSF.ControllerService.PulseEffect
interface.description: This interface is provided by the LSF Controller Service to enable the LSF Controller Clients to create, update, delete, lookup and apply Pulse Effects on Lamps.

method.name: GetAllPulseEffectIDs
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to fetch all the Pulse Effect IDs.

method.name: GetPulseEffectName
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to fetch the name of a Pulse Effect specified by the pulseEffectID.

method.name: SetPulseEffectName
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to set the name of a Pulse Effect specified by the pulseEffectID.

method.name: CreatePulseEffect
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to create a Pulse Effect.

method.name: UpdatePulseEffect
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to update a Pulse Effect.

method.name: DeletePulseEffect
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to delete a Pulse Effect.

method.name: GetPulseEffect
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to fetch a Pulse Effect.

method.name: ApplyPulseEffectOnLamps
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to apply a Pulse Effect on a set of Lamps.

method.name: ApplyPulseEffectOnLampGroups
method.description: This method allows the LSF Controller Clients to apply a Pulse Effect on a set of LampGroups.

signal.name: PulseEffectsNameChanged
signal.description: The PulseEffectsNameChanged signal is used to notify the list of the Pulse Effect IDs whose names have changed.

signal.name: PulseEffectsCreated
signal.description: The PulseEffectsCreated signal is used to notify the list of the Pulse Effect IDs that have been created.

signal.name: PulseEffectsUpdated
signal.description: The PulseEffectsUpdated signal is used to notify the list of the Pulse Effect IDs that have been updated.

signal.name: PulseEffectsDeleted
signal.description: The PulseEffectsDeleted signal is used to notify the list of the Pulse Effect IDs that have been deleted.
